title: Galaxy Z Flip 4 and Fold 4: New leaks detail battery size, charging, aspect ratios
content:
Samsung’s next foldable lineup is set to bring some welcome new tweaks to the Fold and Flip, and details have been slowly coming out over the past few months. This week, a few new leaks around the Galaxy Z Fold 4 and Flip 4 offer context around the battery size, displays, and the somewhat limited charging speeds.

more…

The post Galaxy Z Flip 4 and Fold 4: New leaks detail battery size, charging, aspect ratios appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Galaxy Z Fold 4 and Flip 4 are rumored to have the same charging speed as what came before them, but that's not a bad thing.
